sentences.en: A backpack is a Viking helmet - neither should be a crowed train.
sentences.cn: 背包像维京海盗的头盔一样,不应该带上拥挤的火车.

sentences.en: By the middle of 9th century, the Viking and the Danes were posing a threat to the Saxon kingdom of Wessex.
sentences.cn: 到9世纪中叶，北欧海盗和丹麦人威胁到撒克逊人的威撒克斯王国的安全。

sentences.en: He could row like a Viking.
sentences.cn: 他划起船来就像北欧海盗一般.

sentences.en: He dances like a Viking AViking.
sentences.cn: 他尤其擅长击杀仇敌. 他跳起舞来就像个维京人一样.

sentences.en: It is said a Norwegian Viking Floki VilgerTarson gave Iceland this name.
sentences.cn: 据说为冰岛命名的人是挪威海盗弗洛基·维尔格达森.

sentences.en: Our coasts were preyed upon by Viking pirates.
sentences.cn: 我们的海岸曾被北欧海盗所劫掠.

sentences.en: Ross : Yeah. He could row like a viking.
sentences.cn: 是啊, 他划得就像维京海盗一样好.

sentences.en: Six hundred Viking boats attacked Hamburg , which was set on fire.
sentences.cn: 600艘海盗船袭击汉堡, 汉堡惨遭焚烧.

sentences.en: The MTW Viking Invasion expansion ends in this year.
The Nicolet - Viking - Select system was used for SSR and RRIV detection.
The story of American Exploration begins with a Viking called "Erik the Red".
sentences.cn: 美洲探险的传奇始于一个名叫“红色埃里克”的维京海盗。

sentences.en: The Viking 1 landed on the Mars on July 20 th.
The Viking and Mars Pathfinder images from the surface look eerily Earth - like.
sentences.cn: 维京人号和火星探路者号传回的火星地表影像,与地球出奇类似.

sentences.en: The Viking spacecraft consisted of two orbiters.
sentences.cn: 维京太空船由两个轨道航行器组成.

sentences.en: Viking Johnson is part of Crane Building Services & Utilities.
sentences.cn: 维京约翰逊是起重机建筑服务 和 公共事业的一部分.

sentences.en: Well, he looked like a 1 Viking.
sentences.cn: 这个啊, 他当时看起来像个北欧海盗.

sentences.en: Yet not everyone viewed the Viking findings as a failure.
sentences.cn: 但并非所有人都将“海盗”探索的结果视为失败.

trans.tran_cn: 海盗，北欧海盗，<口>斯堪的纳维亚人
trans.tran_en: a member of the group of Scandinavian people who sailed in ships to attack areas along the coasts of northern and western Europe from the 8th to 11th centuries
